title: A wiping-type semiconductor-liquid generator utilizing water-bearing solid materials and hydrated biological tissues

The charge generation due to the interaction between solids and liquids is an important branch for microenergy collection. This work presents a wiping-type semiconductor-liquid generator, which provides an ultrahigh transferred...
